T02D2183:39a-0: @39a * // dus bzhi rtsod pa rgyas dus su //
T02D2183:39a-1: sgrub pa po yang mang 'byung zhing //
T02D2183:39a-2: dman la mos pa'ang mang du 'byung //
T02D2183:39a-3: bla ma ra gus pa'ang dpag tu med //
T02D2183:39a-4: pa'i dra'i sems can dpag med kyang //
T02D2183:39a-6: sprul dang kha dog rjes 'jug pa'o //
T02D2183:39a-7: rjes 'jug gnyis su shes par bya'o //
T02D2183:39a-8: sprul la mthun 'jug sbyang ba med //
T02D2183:39a-9: sprul rjes 'jug gi gang zag la //
T02D2183:39a-10: dam tshig nyams pa mang 'byung yang //
T02D2183:39a-11: nyams pa rnam pa gsum du 'dus //
T02D2183:39a-12: lus ngag yid du shes par bya //
T02D2183:39a-13: lus kyi dam tshig nyams pa ni //
T02D2183:39a-14: tsha tshas sbyongs te tshogs sbyor ltos //
T02D2183:39a-15: ngag gi nyams pa bzlas pas 'dag / yid kyi lha yi sbyor kar ltos //
T02D2183:39a-16: thun mong sbyin sreg tshogs gtor rnams //
T02D2183:39a-17: phan 'dogs sbyor kar blta bar gyis //
T02D2183:39a-18: nus pa chung ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2183:39a-19: ma bshags mandala gyis sbyang bya //
T02D2183:39a-20: mandala bsdu na rnam gnyis te //
T02D2183:39a-21: yid kyis bsams dang dngos byed pa'o //
T02D2183:39a-22: dngos byed skyon spangs gnyen bzhi la //
T02D2183:39a-23: brgya'am lnga bcu nyi shu lnga //
T02D2183:39a-24: lnga'am bsdus pa gcig kyang bya //
T02D2183:39a-25: dbyibs legs mdzes pa bsham par bya //
T02D2183:39a-26: kha dog kun nas sngo yang rung //
T02D2183:39a-27: dkar po mthing gser dmar bya //
T02D2183:39a-28: yang na yid dang mthun pa'ang rung //
T02D2183:39a-29: tshad ni khru gang yan chad bya //
T02D2183:39a-30: tshon ni dkar rtsi yung ba dang //
T02D2183:39a-31: sngo rtsi gur gum mtshal gyis bya //
T02D2183:39a-32: ba yi rnam lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D2183:39a-33: dum bu gcig par bzhag nas kyang //
T02D2183:39a-34: dri zhim pa yi sman gyis bsgo //
T02D2183:39a-35: bdud rtsi lnga dang thun mong rdzas //
T02D2183:39a-36: gser sogs kha rgyan lnga ldan du //
T02D2183:39a-37: bcug la byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya //
T02D2183:39a-38: rang nyid cho ga gsum gyis bskyed //
T02D2183:39a-40: aom aa mri ta kunda li h'um phat /
T02D2183:39b-0: byin brlabs bkra shis rdzas dang sreg / de yis thams cad @39b bsang bar bya //
T02D2183:39b-1: aom aa mri ta kunda li ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02D2183:39b-2: yungs kar la gdab 'byung po bsrel //
T02D2183:39b-3: rang gi snying ga'i yig 'bru las //
T02D2183:39b-5: de 'phros tam gi yi ge las //
T02D2183:39b-6: sa gzhi rin chen bzhi ru gyur //
T02D2183:39b-9: grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas /
T02D2183:39b-11: tsandan ga pur gla rtsi sogs //
T02D2183:39b-12: mdzes pa'i snod du bzhag pa la //
T02D2183:39b-14: bdug pa'i mchog tu gyur par bsam //
T02D2183:39b-16: tsandan med du mi rung ngo ;
T02D2183:39b-17: / rgyan gyi me tog lnga gsum sogs //
T02D2183:39b-18: gcig sogs yang na lnga grags bstun //
T02D2183:39b-19: de steng pam las padma bya //
T02D2183:39b-22: stong ldan 'bum ldan du gyur bsam //
T02D2183:39b-23: de yi steng du bhr'um yig las //
T02D2183:39b-24: gzhal yas khang ni mdzes pa bsam//
T02D2183:39b-25: badzra re kh'a'i sngags ni kun la gdab //
T02D2183:39b-26: snying ga'i 'od kyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2183:39b-27: mchod rdzas padma mdun du bskyed //
T02D2183:39b-28: rgyun ni gong gi yi ge las //
T02D2183:39b-29: de dag thams cad rdzogs pa ni //
T02D2183:39b-30: nyams pa dgos pa gzhan mos 'jug / de 'og dam tshig nyams pa kun //
T02D2183:39b-31: lus bkru gos bzang rgyan cha bgo //
T02D2183:39b-32: lhar bsam rdor dril sngags byin brlag / sa bon yi ge 'od zer gyis //
T02D2183:39b-33: lha mo bzhi bskyed lha spyan drangs //
T02D2183:39b-34: gsol ba gdab la rtsa sngags gdags //
T02D2183:39b-35: bla ma mi bskyod gyur sogs la //
T02D2183:39b-36: phyag 'tshal mchod pa thams cad bya //
T02D2183:39b-37: rgyud las byung ba'i bstod pa bya //
T02D2183:39b-39: rang gi snying ga'i padma la //
T02D2183:39b-40: kam dang na la sdig pa bsdu //
T02D2183:39b-41: sdom nag gzugs su gyur bsams te //
T02D2183:39b-42: phyir 'gro rlung gis mdun du dbyung //
T02D2183:39b-43: sdig pa'i gzugs dbyung sngags kyis bsreg / lus ngag so so'i sdig sbyong ba //
T02D2183:39b-44: so so'i gnas su ni bsams te //
T02D2183:39b-45: so so'i sdig pa 'dus nas byung //
T02D2183:39b-46: gsod pa khro ba'am gong sbyor bzhin //
T02D2183:39b-47: yang na lus kyi srog chags gzugs //
T02D2183:39b-49: gzugs su dbyung ste rgyud las 'byung //
T02D2183:39b-50: yang na lha yi 'od zer gyis //
T02D2183:39b-51: ba spu'i bu ga kun khyab ste //
T02D2183:39b-52: rgyud kyi sdig pa bsregs par bsam//
T02D2183:40a-1: bdud rtsi lta bus lus khyab nas //
T02D2183:40a-2: gsos nas mchog tu gyur par bsam //
T02D2183:40a-3: yang na brgya rtsa rtsa ba'i sngags //
T02D2183:40a-4: bzlas pas gong bzhin sdig pa sbyong //
T02D2183:40a-5: yi ge brgya pa'i dbang por bsgyur //
T02D2183:40a-6: brgya rtsa sngags 'bum bzlas pa dang ;
T02D2183:40a-7: / sum cha phyed phri rab nyams sbyong //
T02D2183:40a-8: sum gnyis sum cha sum cha dang //
T02D2183:40a-9: sum gnyis phre [?] bas 'bring gsum sbyong //
T02D2183:40a-10: de las phyed phyed phri bas ni //
T02D2183:40a-11: tha ma'i nyams pa rnam gsum spyod //
T02D2183:40a-12: sum brgya nyis brgya lnga bcu dang //
T02D2183:40a-13: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ni //
T02D2183:40a-14: yan lag che chung nyams pa sbyong //
T02D2183:40a-15: de 'og zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2183:40a-16: nus pa yod na tshogs 'khor bya //
T02D2183:40a-17: de 'og bum pa rnams bsams te //
T02D2183:40a-18: gcig tu lha mo rnams bskyed de //
T02D2183:40a-19: gcig tu rdor 'dzin mi bskyod pa //
T02D2183:40a-20: bskyed nas byin brlab tshul bzhin bya //
T02D2183:40a-21: dang po lha mos khrus byas te //
T02D2183:40a-22: rdo rje 'dzin pas gnyis med bsam //
T02D2183:40a-23: mi bskyod bum pas dbang bskur bas //
T02D2183:40a-24: yang na gnyis kas dbang bskur bya //
T02D2183:40a-26: de 'og bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod //
T02D2183:40a-27: gong gi sbyor ba rdzogs pa kun //
T02D2183:40a-28: dam tshig nyams pa'i mandala yin //
T02D2183:40a-29: de las gzhan du gcig kyang rung //
T02D2183:40a-30: rdzogs la brtan pa ma thob par //
T02D2183:40a-32: rnal 'byor spyod lam ma zhugs par //
T02D2183:40a-33: gong ma'i mandala de dag kun //
T02D2183:40a-34: yid kyis mdun du bsam byas nas //
T02D2183:40a-35: yid kyis dbul ba yid kyis yin //
T02D2183:40a-36: bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i dri zhim rdzas //
T02D2183:40a-37: bsku ba nang gi yin par 'dod //
T02D2183:40a-38: phyi ru phyi yi me tog yin //
T02D2183:40a-39: bla ma las brgyud mandala sbyor ka 'di //
T02D2183:40a-40: blo zhan don du bdag gis cung zad bsdus //
T02D2183:40a-41: 'khrul par gyur na mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod //
T02D2183:40a-42: 'di byas dge bas gos sngon can thob shog / rnal 'byor dbang gis nyes par snang //
T02D2183:40a-43: blun po legs par bshad pa dman //
T02D2183:40a-44: mthong rgya chung na yangs pa'ang dog / rgyud dang man ngag la brten nas //
T02D2183:40a-45: rnyed 'dod rnams kyis 'dod 'dod spyad du med //
T02D2183:40a-46: ma mthong dogs na skal rnams med par thal //
